text: hello my name is Naveen Narayan I am a
specialist Solutions architect for
Amazon connect Amazon connect is an easy
to use omnichannel cloud contact center
platform that helps you provide customer
service at a lower cost in this video
I'd like to talk about Amazon connect
wisdom and how it can help your contact
center agents automatically receive
recommendations from your knowledge base
throughout the duration of a phone call
these recommendations can help them
quickly understand and resolve customer
issues
when an agent is on a call with a
customer they can lose valuable time
searching through their organization's
knowledge base for information on how to
solve customer issues this time last is
a confusing experience for both the
customer and the agent it also increases
the talk time which ultimately increases
the cost of the call
we released wisdom in September 2021 to
address just this challenge it's a
feature that automatically delivers
agents the information they need
reducing the time in searching for
answers
behind the scenes wisdom uses Amazon
Connect contact lens to transcribe the
call in real time
it then automatically detects customers
concerns searches connected repositories
and provides relevant recommendations to
your agents
it does this through several machine
learning models that have been trained
specifically on contact center
communication patterns this gives wisdom
a near human level of precision in
understanding a color's intent
of course agent can also simply enter
questions or phrases in their desktop
application such as what is the pet
policy in our hotel rooms or I'm having
Wi-Fi issues with my laptop and wisdom
will search and return the most relevant
information to handle the customer
issues let me show you how this looks
like so in the following demonstration
the customer Elizabeth calls into an IT
help desk with an issue about her laptop
she's connected with an agent Naveen
Elizabeth then begins to explain the
issue with her laptop keyboard and USB
port you'll notice that as she speaks
with Naveen wisdom automatically gets
recommendations from the company's
knowledge base and serves them up so
Naveen can identify and help
troubleshoot the issue
even when Elizabeth doesn't use the
exact words that are there in this
article wisdom can semantically
understand what she's referring to
you'll notice that the agent didn't have
to spend any time on searching through
the documentation the relevant links
were automatically suggested throughout
the call
wisdom comes with pre-built connectors
for Salesforce servicenow and zendesk in
addition to robust apis wisdom can take
in HTML or plain text content from your
knowledge base repositories and once
these are ingested the knowledge content
can be assessed through Amazon connects
agent application or any custom agent
application that you might be using
the API also allows you to encrypt the
content using a KMS key and to specify
the sync frequency so content is always
fresh and relevant well that wraps up
our demo of wisdom to learn more about
Amazon connect and wisdom please visit
aws.com forward slash connect or please
feel free to reach out to your AWS sales
specialist thank you
